body.p: If you look inside the bundle-frameworks\oxygen-frameworks folder distributed with the sample project, it contains a frameworks folder. Customizations that affect the framework configuration for the component should first be done in a standalone installation of .

An standalone installation also includes a frameworks folder that contains the dita framework located in \frameworks\dita. The dita framework contains a bundled DITA-OT distribution that contains the DTDs used for DITA editing. If your DTD specialization is a DITA OT plugin, it should be installed in the \plugins folder.

To make changes to the DITA framework configuration, , go to Document Type Association, and edit or extend the framework. These changes will affect the \frameworks\dita\dita.framework configuration file.

After you do this, you can re-pack the following the instructions from the README.html file located in the sample project. The Author Component sample project and the standalone installation should be of the same version.
